required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability (RBA) Study of LY03005 vs Pristiq®
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Cross-over, 2-period Study to Assess the Relative Bioavailability Between 80 mg LY03005 Versus 50 mg Desvenlafaxine Comparator (Pristiq®) Under Fasting Condition After Single Dose Administration in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate relative bioavailability between 80 mg LY03005 oral tablets and 50 mg Pristiq® oral tablets after a single dose of each drug in a cross-over 2-period design under fasting condition in healthy subjects between 18 and 50 years of age.

detailed_description.textblock: Twenty (20) eligible subjects will be enrolled and assigned to either Group A or Group B at a 1:1 ratio.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) Assessment
primary_outcome.time_frame: PK Samples drawn at 0, 1,2,3,4, 6,8,10,12,24,32,48 and 72 hours after dosing in both Period 1 and Period 2.
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) for the Pharmacokinetics (PK) of O-desmethyl-venlafaxine (ODV) from LY03005 and ODV from Pristiq will be determined.

primary_outcome.time_frame: PK Samples drawn at 0, 1,2,3,4, 6,8,10,12,24,32,48 and 72 hours after dosing in both Period 1 and Period 2.
primary_outcome.description: Maximum concentration (Cmax) for the Pharmacokinetics (PK) of O-desmethyl-venlafaxine (ODV) from LY03005 and ODV from Pristiq will be determined.

secondary_outcome.description: Collection of adverse events throughout the study as a measure of safety and tolerability.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group A: LY03005 cross-over to Pristiq®
arm_group.description: Subjects in Group A will receive an 80 mg oral dose of LY03005 and the subjects will stay in the CRU for 4 days (Period 1). After a washout period of up to 4 days, the subjects will be switched and will receive a 50 mg oral dose of desvenlafaxine (Pristiq®) comparator followed by a 4-day stay in the CRU (Period 2).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group B: Pristiq® cross-over to LY03005
arm_group.description: Subjects in Group B will receive a 50 mg oral dose of desvenlafaxine (Pristiq®) comparator and the subjects will stay in the CRU for 4 days (Period 1). After a washout period of up to 4 days, the subjects will be switched and will receive an 80 mg oral dose of LY03005 followed by a 4-day stay in the CRU (Period 2).

intervention.arm_group_label: Group A: LY03005 cross-over to Pristiq®
Group B: Pristiq® cross-over to LY03005
Group A: LY03005 cross-over to Pristiq®
Group B: Pristiq® cross-over to LY03005
